page.title: 02CHARTRIGE FARM REF.9204
page.content: We asked the farmer at Chartridge about the farm and farming in the area.He had lived in the area for 47 years.The farm was 300 years old.He kept cattle,sheep,hens,and some pets. He used modern machinery on his 200 acres.He grew four crops:corn;barley; oats and wheat.He said that he kept his cows for their meat.The oldest cow was 3 years old.The major change on his farm over the years was discarding the horse for mechanisation.He owned 3 barns. He told us he enjoyed his work,and living at the farm By M.Aris and N.Wellsted.
